net.sharemycode.service

Class ProjectService

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sharemycode.service.ProjectService

  • @Path(value="/projects")
public class ProjectService
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines all RESTful services relating to project entities
    Author:
    Lachlan Archibald

      • uploadProject

        @POST
 @Consumes(value="application/json")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response uploadProject(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> properties)
                                                                                                                        throws java.net.URISyntaxException
        Creates a new project with a list of ProjectAttachment ids
        Parameters:
        properties - JSON project information and list of attachmentId
        Returns:
        Response.created() with Project
        Throws:
        java.net.URISyntaxException - if resulting URI is invalid

                                                                                                                                                       @QueryParam(value="root")
                                                                                                                                                       int root)
        Lists Project Resources
        Parameters:
        projectid - ProjectID to get resources
        root - 0: list all, 1: list only top-level resources
        Returns:
        List of ProjectResource

        Parameters:
